name: Mega Man Star Force 3: Red Joker
description:
Nintendo.com Description (from Ad Blurbs)

Help Mega Man master his transformations and save the world again!



The world is in peril from a mysterious “noise” that is affecting the EM digital world. Through his bond with the alien Omega, Geo must transform into Mega Man to uncover the mystery behind the noise and protect the Earth. Can he master the new Mega Man transformations of Black Ace and Red Joker that the noise has unleashed before it’s too late?

Features

• Master over 10 different Mega Man transformations to tap his ultimate power• Over 360 different battle card powers to discover and use• Downloadable content extends the game available after launch• Each version (Black Ace, Red Joker) includes unique transformations for Mega Man• Based on one of the most popular video game characters of all time: Mega Man!• Up to 7 Players

As of May 20, 2014, the Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection service for Nintendo DSi and Wii systems has been retired. Online features of this game are no longer available after this date but this game still provides an entertaining experience in offline mode.
